repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Daniel Mitchell Collection of U.S. Executive Office of the President Phase II Payboard Records
did.abstract: Economic papers of the Phase II Pay Board. These records were produced by the Office of the Chief Economist, first known as the Economic Anaylysis Division, directed by Daniel Mitchell.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Economic papers of the Phase II Pay Board. These records were produced by the Office of the Chief Economist, first known as the Economic Anaylysis Division, directed by Daniel Mitchell.

Also included are some Pay Board documents relating to specific cases before the Board. The economic papers appeared in the agenda book which the Board received before each meeting, or in supplements to that book.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Daniel Mitchell Collection of U.S. Executive Office of the President Phase II Payboard Records #5218. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
